name: Cells (akai_0okami)
description:
You play as a white blood cell destroying viruses.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 77.

Credits

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio 1.4
  • Graphics made using Aseprite and GIMP
  • Sound effects made using ChipTone
  • Background music: Long Time Coming by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
